definition: to comfort/to console/to stroke/to caress/an old term for province or provincial governor
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: Mila was guided to give her son to her ex-spouse to raise in full.
sentences.chinese: Mila被引导将儿子送回到前配偶那里完全抚养。

sentences.english: People who want to adopt orphans should have the ability to raise them, Chen added.
sentences.chinese: 陈还补充说，想要收养孤儿的人需要有抚养能力。

sentences.english: Unsurprisingly, most parents like to bring up their child themselves.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，大部分父母都希望亲自抚养孩子。

sentences.english: Fedorova is an only child, and she was brought up by her mother and maternal grandparents.
sentences.chinese: 是单亲家庭的女儿，由母亲和外祖父祖母抚养长大。

sentences.english: Wang Zun from the dead father, raised by his uncle.
sentences.chinese: 王尊从小死去父亲，由他的伯父抚养长大。

sentences.english: Custody of their infant daughter became a major issue, both say.
sentences.chinese: 他们都为他们第一个宝宝的抚养权问题头疼。

sentences.english: When it comes to hunting, the females do the lion's share, in addition to raising the young ones.
sentences.chinese: 但在捕猎时，母狮在抚养幼狮之外还要给公狮一份。

sentences.english: Women are responsible for cooking, raising children, and taking care of housework.
sentences.chinese: 妇女负责做饭，抚养孩子，家务劳动。

sentences.english: For Mr. Arif, raising Mehek without her mother hasn't been easy.
sentences.chinese: 对阿瑞夫来说，独自抚养没有母亲的美哈克并非易事。

sentences.english: She never complained about his not paying child support.
sentences.chinese: 母亲从来没有抱怨过父亲不支付孩子的抚养费。

sentences.english: Dependents of servicemen killed in action could also use the benefits.
sentences.chinese: 阵亡军人的被抚养人也可享用这些福利。

sentences.english: The parents have to raise their child right.
So did time spent in day-care affect school performance?
sentences.chinese: 那么，日托中心的抚养是否会影响儿童的学校表现呢？

sentences.english: So the baby donkey was reared and grew up, and his ears grew up nice and straight too.
sentences.chinese: 于是，小驴儿被抚养长大，他的耳朵直又好，长大了。

sentences.english: Since God created us, he ought to know how we are to be parented as well.
sentences.chinese: 既然神创造了我们，他诚然也知道怎样抚养我们。

definition: to support/to provide support for/to maintain
to take in and care for (an elderly person, a dog etc)/to adopt (a child)/adoption
to suffer every possible torment (idiom); bitter hardship/to bear one's cross
